content: next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r25 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 corinna s corner custom crochet you may sell finished items please link to pattern listing pattern is property of corinna varilek may not be sold or distributed ©2022 herringbone cup sleeve written in us crochet terms r26 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r27 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r28 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r29 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r30 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r31 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r32 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r33 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 finish off and weave in ends add a cute tag if you wish finished size from table to top of sleeve is 6 ¾ medium sleeve- construction of bottom of cup sleeve r1 make a magic_ring ch1 single_crochet 6 slip_stitch to join 6 tip if you do not know how to make a magic_ring you can chain 3 and work your stitches in the first chain omit the chain 1 start and make 6 single_crochet into the first chain slip_stitch to join r2 chain 1 single_crochet increase each st around slip_stitch to join 12 r3 chain 1 half_double_crochet increase same st as chain half_double_crochet next *half_double_crochet increase next half_double_crochet next* slip_stitch to join 18 r4 chain 1 half_double_crochet increase same st as chain half_double_crochet next 2 *half_double_crochet increase next half_double_crochet next 2* slip_stitch to join 24 r5 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain single_crochet next 10 sts single_crochet increase next single_crochet next 11 sts single_crochet increase slip_stitch to join 26 r6 chain 1 single_crochet blo same st as chain single_crochet blo around slip_stitch to join 26 note this creates the disc portion of your cup allowing you to have a nice clean edge where it folds and starts the sides 15 measure the diameter of your sleeve should be at 2 ¾ possibly 2 you can also sit your cup on 16 top and you should see the edges of that last round fit just beyond the edge of your cup like a coaster if not at this point adjust your gauge and try again or go down 1 hook size or up if it was too small the exact size isn t mission critical here remember yarn stretches so if you
